name: Dancer Party | Dance Simulator
description:
WARNING: Flashing lights and fast changing colors. Also extremely bad dance moves.

Dance like you never danced before! Simulate real world, very accurate dance moves typically reserved to only the most veteran and skilled dancers.

Instructions:

  • Hold mouse button left or right + drag around to get jiggy.
  • A or D keys to walk it out.

Tips:

  • More mouse moving = better dancing
  • Play your own sound for improved experience.
